Package world

Class Board

java.lang.Object
world.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
represents a board.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Cell[][] cellArray
    2 dimensional array representing the cells of the board with associate coordinates
    private int size
    the size of the board.
    private java.util.ArrayList<Coord[]> wallList
    list containing all the walls that have been placed (each wall is an array of size 2 containing the origin and the second part of the wall)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Board​(int size)
    initiate the board.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • size

      private int size
      the size of the board. Note that it's a squared board

    • cellArray

      private Cell[][] cellArray
      2 dimensional array representing the cells of the board with associate coordinates

    • wallList

      private java.util.ArrayList<Coord[]> wallList
      list containing all the walls that have been placed (each wall is an array of size 2 containing the origin and the second part of the wall)

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board​(int size)
      initiate the board. Creating all the cell needed, all the directions, etc...
      Parameters:
      size - the size of the board. Note that it's a square.

  • Method Details

    • getCellArray

      public Cell[][] getCellArray()
      Returns:
      the 2D array containing all the cell of the board

    • getWallList

      public java.util.ArrayList<Coord[]> getWallList()
      Returns:
      the list containing all the wall that have been placed on the board

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns:
      the size of the board

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell​(Coord coord)
      Parameters:
      coord - the coordinates of the cell we want
      Returns:
      the cell at the given coordinates

    • addToWallList

      public void addToWallList​(Coord[] coordOfWall)
      Parameters:
      coordOfWall - an array containing the coordinates of the first part of the wall and the coordinates of the following parts (length of 2 in a standard game)

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
